mapper.select: select video_info.video_info_id, video_info.video_name, video_info.video_description, video_info.video_image, child.category_id, child.category_name, video_info.video_producer, video_info.video_actors, video_info.up_time, video_info.play_number from category_info child join category_info root on child.parent_id = root.category_id join video_info on child.category_id = video_info.category_id where root.category_id = #{categoryId} and video_info.status = ${@neko.movie.nekomoviecommonbase.utils.entity.VideoStatus@UP} order by video_info.play_number desc limit #{limited}
